name: Bun Run
description:
BUN RUN is a platformer where you are a baby bunny trying to reach home before night hits. Dodge obstacles and enemies in order to reach your goal and collect berries to enhance your character abilities.

Rules: Get from the start of the level to the den to complete the level. Collect power-ups for temporary boosts that can help reach the end goal. 

Interface: The controls in the game is tap to jump and using the joystick to move. The menus will be touch screen and will have indicators for the controls. There will be a  help menu and options menu.

Collect:
-Speed Berry (5 sec speed boost))

Avoid: 
-Fake Berries
-Boulders
-Falling behind

Team:
Programmer: 
Sayan Tarafder

Artist:
Makenna Ford

Ground assets:
